original_title: Bowie, l’Homme Cent Visages ou le Fantôme d’Hérouville
overview: The best way to follow Bowie's trail, the phantom, was to start at a place he haunted: the mythical Hérouville Castle Studios. It was there, partly, that the 1970s rock wrote its legend, of which Bowie is one of the main protagonists.
title: Bowie, Man with a Hundred Faces or The Phantom of Hérouville
